Create, share, and collaborate on diagrams, wireframes, and visual ideas in real-time with Shapesmith.

Joined this month

Why Shapesmith?

Designed with simplicity and collaboration in mind, our platform helps teams visualize ideas effortlessly.

Real-time Collaboration

Work together with your team in real-time, seeing changes instantly as they happen.

Unlimited Rooms

Create as many collaborative spaces as you need for different projects and teams.

Secure Sharing

Control who can view and edit your drawings with flexible permission settings.

Smart Shapes

Create perfect shapes that automatically snap into place with our intelligent drawing tools.

Customizable Styles

Personalize your drawings with a wide range of colors, styles, and formatting options.

Cloud-Based

Access your drawings from anywhere, on any device, with our cloud-based platform.

How It Works

Get started in just a few simple steps.

1

Create an Account

Sign up for a free account to get started with Shapesmith.

2

Create or Join a Room

Start a new drawing room or join an existing one with a simple link.

3

Draw & Collaborate

Use our intuitive tools to create shapes, add text, and collaborate in real-time.

Interactive Demo

See Shapesmith in Action

Try out these example rooms or create your own to experience the power of collaborative drawing.
